parameters: \n<Alain>It's probably not a good idea to go
\n<Mirie>Welcome to Mirie's Magic Shop. Sorry, I'm working
\n<Gale>Hello, excuse us. Are you Miss Mirie, awoo?
\n<Mirie>Yes. I'm Mirie. I'm a little busy with my ailment
\n<Mirie>I don't take drop-in customers. I have a list of
people ahead of you for orders of magic items and
\n<Gale>Ah. Well, the lady at the guild shop, Iora, said
we should drop by to get some help with our
\n<Mirie>Urgh. Iora? Both her and the Guild Master... I
can't refuse then since I keep forcing the guild to do
\n<Mirie>I may have paid back the guild master with the
magic tools she was interested in, but Iora's a lot
tougher to have owe me one because she's such a
\nr<Alain>Sounds like the guild and this shop
\n<Mirie>Huh? Did I hear something muffled just now? ...
Wait, did it come out of your chest?
\n<Gale>Oh, that's just my Master. I'm keeping him safe by
letting him ride in there while I move around. I've
done it for a while now.
\n<Mirie>What? And wait... 'a while?' Isn't Mini temporary?
Does that mean... a cursed item?
\n<Mirie>A status effect cursed item?! And it's Mini?! OH
GODDESS! My dry spell's finally over?!
me between Gale's boobs like that!
\n<Mirie>I'm an alchemist studying status effect items. I've
had better luck with other random junk items than
status effect focused ones, sadly, so I got a little
\nr<Alain>I mean, I can't fault you for wanting
to see rare equipment. It's a pain that I
can't take this off because of the curse
be an easier one for you to look at.
\n<Mirie>A transformation ring too? Okay, I stand corrected.
This isn't Iora collecting on a favor. She is making
\n<Mirie>You two. I'm fine if you want to get items from
me. As long as you visit every once in a while, that's
\n<Mirie>If I get to work with people equipped with cursed
status ailment items, my research will DEFINITELY get
\n<Gale>U-Uh... Is that really okay? (*Whisper* Awoo... she's
researching Mini sounds helpful to me. I
keep hoping somebody will find an easier
\n<Mirie>I don't have that many materials so you'll have
to provide them yourselves, but I'll make whatever I
know how to make for you two.
\n<Mirie>Here, let me let you know what I'm capable of
making and what I would need to build or make them
Mirie handed over a copy of her Alchemy Notes!
Some items can be synthesized together into a new item
Simply interact with Mirie's Alchemy Circle to open up
the Alchemy menu. As long as all of the necessary items
are present, Mirie can create the desired item.
\n<Mirie>Feel free to use my alchemy skills whenever you
\n<Mirie>Wait... it looks like you came for a different
reason. What are you here for today?
\n<Gale>Awoo! We're here about your quest, Miss Mirie.
\n<Mirie>Oh, thank goodness. I was getting desperate because
I've been sleeping on the floor the past few nights.
\n<Mirie>A bunch of things piled up while I was researching
and I need them removed. It's too much of a bother to
go around, and I'm not exactly the physical type.
\n<Gale>Are you alright with me breaking any of it? I can
get rid of it in an instant if that were the case, woo!
\n<Mirie>Sure, but you're the one who wants to be careful.
The artifact that's really been preventing me from
getting anywhere closer to my bed is a pretty tough.
\n<Mirie>Sorry. It was a terrible idea to activate it when
I didn't know what it did...
\n<Gale>Awoo?! That sounds more dangerous than any other
community quest I've taken so far!
\n<Mirie>But yeah. Give it a smack if you have to. It's not
related to my status ailment research anyways.
\n<Mirie>I'm so glad to be able to sleep comfortably on
\n<Mirie>I bought a bunch of random junk artifacts in
bulk at an auction in hopes I could get something good
and status effect related. That golem surprised me too.
The mess in Mirie's room has been cleaned up! Now she can
sleep in her own bed again!
Well... That's assuming she remembers to sleep instead
of being engrossed in her research.
\n<Mirie>If you're ever tired while helping me out here,
feel free to use that bed too. I don't mind.
The bed in the magic shop is now available to sleep in.
Alain can now approach Mirie without Gale.
\nc<Gale>Miss Mirie! We got the special core you wanted!
\n<Mirie>Oh, Gale. You're the one who took it... Oh, and
\nr<Vio>Nice to meet you. I'm Vio. Miss Gale and I had a
lovely bonding battle by the riverbed and fought
\n<Mirie>Eh? That's the kind of 'manly bonding' I've
heard turns rival into sworn blood brothers.
\nc<Gale>Uh, Miss Vio! We fought on the cliffs of the
\nr<Vio>I was just being poetic. It IS true that we fought
back-to-back with each other before though!
\n<Mirie>Heh. Looks like you're good friends in any case.
\n<Mirie>Now let me see that Condensed Magic Core. I want
to make sure that this works.
Handed over the Condensed Magic Core.
\nc<Gale>Awoo? What did you make, Miss Mirie?
\nr<Vio>It looks like an airship. Are you planning on making
a big one that you can ride on?
\n<Mirie>Where's the fun in that? I maybe a magic tool
alchemist, but I'm also a big Mini researcher.
\n<Mirie>I'm not making a big one. I'm making an easily
operable little one that can be used even at a shrunken
\n<Mirie>Wouldn't this be great for anyone hit with Mini?
It always makes you helpless when you're so small and
leaves you stranded trying to get to safety.
\n<Mirie>With an airship, even at a smaller size, an
adventurer would be able to get out of danger swiftly!
\nc<Gale>It's true. Whenever I was shrunken down with Master
in my dragon form, the only reason we were able to
survive was because I was so fast to us out of danger.
\n<Mirie>Right!? I'd love for Alain to test this whenever
he can. That's why I planned to give out one of these
\nr<Est>A small scale airship, huh? That's not a bad idea.
If it goes fast enough and is durable enough, that'd
\nr<Est>As a demon, I've got to give credit where credit
is due - this girl's pretty smart if she can make
\nr<Est>You don't seem to happy about it, though, Alain.
\n<Alain>Ah. Well, I realized it from when she
held it - isn't it actually TOO small?
\n<Alain>I think she went way too compact with
\nr<Est>Small? Oh, you're right. It's close to our size.
It's supposed to be bigger if you want to be able to
\n<Mirie>Ah! The voice between your boobs is right! I went
for a small design since it doesn't consume as much
mana, but it IS too small when even the smallest Mini
\n<Mirie>Blasted... I guess I'll have to come up with an
idea to make this fit Alain's size.
\n<Mirie>Sorry about that. In the future, I'll put up a quest
for Alain to try it out once I figure out what to do.
\n<Mirie>I guess I'll just have to give you the payment
A Concentrated Magical Core has been delivered to the
Received 4000 G and an Enfeebling Staff!
\n<Mirie>Hm... Growing it's impossible, but how about if
Another Alain Quest will be available at the guild!
\n<Mirie>Well look at you flying around. You're a lot like
an insect in that state, so be careful not to get
\n<Alain>Well, Mirie knows I'm here, so I should
be able to talk to her.
Wait for Gale to wake up?
\n<Alain>Are we going to get closer to Gale on
A pile of random artifacts buried in ores and rocks.
\n<Gale>I'm ready for this... I think! It seems tough.
are, I suppose. Nobody knows much about
them other than the fact that they were
\n<Gale>And I thought humans were advanced enough!
